analysis.summary: Your computer's speed check is still running. We have some basic info, but need more details to find what's slowing it down.

issues.title: Speed Check Still In Progress
issues.description: The tools are still gathering information about what's slowing down your computer.
issues.whatThisMeans: We can't give specific advice yet because the checking isn't finished.
issues.foundEvidence: Most tests show they're still working on collecting information

fixes.title: Wait for the Full Check to Finish
fixes.whyThis: We need complete results to find the real problem slowing you down.
steps: Let the computer finish checking itself
We'll have specific fixes once the check is done

commands: No commands needed - diagnostics are still running
technicalDetails.expectedOutcome: Complete diagnostic results will be available showing startup programs, memory usage, background processes, and temporary files
verification: Check back to see if all diagnostic sections show actual results instead of 'Coming soon'
rollback: No rollback needed - this is just waiting for information

fixes.title: Restart Your Computer While Waiting
fixes.whyThis: A fresh start often speeds things up and clears out stuck programs.
steps: Save any work you have open
Wait for your computer to turn back on

prerequisites: Save all open documents and close programs
technicalDetails.expectedOutcome: Computer restarts fresh, clearing memory and stopping background processes that may be causing slowness
verification: Computer should feel more responsive after restarting
Check Task Manager to see if fewer programs are running
rollback: No rollback needed - restart is completely safe and reversible
